question_text: Which of the following best describes a key difference between desktop and laptop memory modules?
answer_options: Laptop modules are soldered directly to the CPU.
Laptop modules have more pins than desktop modules.
Laptop modules are smaller and often installed horizontally.
Desktop modules are thinner than laptop modules.
correct_answer: Laptop modules are smaller and often installed horizontally.
explanation: Laptop memory modules (SO-DIMMs) are more compact and typically installed flat due to space constraints.
